subject: AI & Agents
title: Self-Attention Step by Step
description: Learn Self-Attention Step by Step in one minute.

hook.text: Every word in a sentence asks three questions: What am I? What do I want? What can I offer?

buildup.text: Each token produces three vectors: Query (what I seek), Key (what I offer), Value (my content).

discovery.text: Queries match against Keys to produce attention scores. High scores mean strong relevance.

twist.text: The model doesn't pick one word to attend to â€” it blends all words, weighted by relevance.

climax.text: The result: each word gets a context-rich representation that incorporates the entire sentence.

punchline.text: Ask, match, blend. That's attention in three steps.

quiz.question: What are the three vectors in self-attention?
